column1: A family graveside service will be held at 10:00 am on Tuesday
column3: 2015 in the Oak Hill Cemetery in Water Valley
column4: MS. The family will receive friends from 1:30 p.m. until 3:00 p.m. on Tuesday at First Presbyterian Church in Water Valley. A memorial service will follow the visitation at 3:00 p.m. at the church
